name: Usbackup
tagline: A Simple Removable Drive Backup program with python
body:
### USB Backup Script With Python
USBackup is simple backup program. When you plug a removable drive in it detects it and copies all files to C drive as new folders(Usbackup-1,Usbackup-2 ......)
### Startup
Its also automaticaly adding the program to startup folder so the program will be executing when windows starts.
### Converting to Exe with Using py2exe module
And you can convert it to exe without having any issues. So it will run on any computer.

### Authors and Contributors
Author : Metehan Cetinkaya (@MeteHanC)
